Interested in #investing in indie films? Well look no further then our upcoming feature The Bridal Party! Multiple accolades and glowing reviews from top competition and festival judges (Including Raindance, Screencraft and The Screenwriter's Network) and an incredible cast of emerging and name talent attached, The Bridal Party has everything a feature comedy can have! Click the link or DM for any more information. #invest #investment #film #comedy #movie #equity

Happy National Cinema Day! Today is the day to celebrate the magic of movies and the joy they bring to our lives. Whether you prefer comedy, drama, romance, or action, there is a movie for everyone. What is your favorite movie of all time? Let us know in the comments below! #nationalcinemaday #movielover #cinemagic

https://lnkd.in/dbPi-ghB This 1 hour film made in just 9000rs, which took 2 years to complete. The story depicts of a boy whose height is short but his dreams are big. The difference between his expectations and reality creates a buzz in his life, watch to know the full story.

Is "Not Another Church Movie" Worth Watching? | Tyler Perry Movie Parody Review In this video, Mike Messier gives his honest review of the movie "Not Another Church Movie," a parody of Tyler Perry movies. Find out if this comedy is worth checking out, and who the target audience is. Watch this review before deciding to see the film! #NotAnotherChurchMovieReview #TylerPerryParody #ComedyMovieReview #MovieReview #FilmAnalysis #EntertainmentReview #ComedyFilm #MovieOpinions #TylerPerryFans #MovieRecommendation

Deadpool and Wolverine is more of a Deadpool film than a Wolverine one. There, we said it. The merc with a mouth is back with his R-rated, fourth-wall-breaking humor, tons of cameos, chart-topping music, and the most popular X-Men character. What's not to love, right? Tell us how you liked the film, and for more such videos, stay tuned to Midday. #Deadpool #Wolverine #DeadpoolAndWolverine #SuperheroMovies #XMen #FilmReview #MovieCameos #ActionComedy #MiddayRecommends
